text: Tarnowski from the European Championship gold medal in RS: X in Mondello, Sicily, 2015. Photo by P. Paterek. Tarnowski in Mondello, Sicily in June 2015. Photo by P. Paterek Paweł Aleksander Maria Tarnowski (born April 3, 1994 in Gdynia) is a Polish sailor, son of Jacek Tarnowski, (businessman and the politician, in 2005-2006 Head of the Chancellery of the Polish Prime Minister) the article about his father in the Polish version of Wikipedia. and Monika Wanicka.Tarnowski family genealogy. Tarnowski already competed at the top- level when he was a teenager, becoming a multiple medal winner in Junior World Championships. In 2011 and 2012, he won a gold medal at the RS:X Junior World Championships, and he won medals in European Champion. In first he started in classes Techno 293 Class and at present RS:X, (including in a category age under 17 (U-17) and under 21 years of age (U-21). He is sometimes seen as a model in commercials, including polish company Atlas or on the cover of album Superheroes : Chapter One - Courage of the band Synthphonia.SynthphoniaMusic - profile on Facebook == Achievements SAILOR BIOGRAPHY na The Official Website of the International Sailing Federation - RESULTS, Paweł Tarnowski - Official. == {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#efefef" | width="30" |Year | width="20" |Position | width="300" |Boat type | width="90" |Age category | width="500" |Event |- ||2019||align="center"| 16px || RS:X - Men's Windsurfer || Senior|| XIV Andalusian Olympic Week Bay of Cadiz in Cádiz Troje Polaków na podium Andalusian Olympic Week, czternaścioro w dziesiątce! on http://pya.org.pl March 4, 2019 |- ||2018||align="center"| Image:Med 2.png || RS:X - Men's Windsurfer || Senior|| Konsal Formula Windsurfing European Championships 2018 in Puck Konsal Formula Windsurfing European Championships - FW FIN Class, silver medal in European Formula, but in Open Formula only bronze medal. |- ||2018||align="center"| Image:Med 3.png || RS:X FW Foil Windsurfing or Hydrofoil Windsurfing. || Senior|| Konsal Formula Windsurfing European Championships 2018 in Puck Konsal Formula Windsurfing European Championships - FOIL OPEN Class bronze medal in European Formula, but in Open Formula only 4th pleace. |- ||2018||align="center"| Image:Med 1.png || RS:X - Men's Windsurfer || Senior|| 49 Princess Sofia Trophy 2018 in Palma de Mallorca 49 Trofeo S.A.R.
